name: nekcem

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Spectral-element solver for Maxwell's equations, drift-diffusion
equations, and more.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Cray's MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of
the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (Intel oneMKL; formerly Intel Math
Kernel Library or Intel MKL), is a library of optimized math routines
for science, engineering, and financial applications. Core math
functions include BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, sparse solvers, fast Fourier
transforms, and vector math. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and
using this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the
software license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (Intel oneMKL; formerly Intel Math
Kernel Library or Intel MKL), is a library of optimized math routines
for science, engineering, and financial applications. Core math
functions include BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, sparse solvers, fast Fourier
transforms, and vector math. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and
using this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the
software license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependent_to.name: ceed
dependent_to.description:
Ceed is a collection of benchmarks, miniapps, software libraries and
APIs for efficient high-order finite element and spectral element
discretizations for exascale applications developed in the Department of
Energy (DOE) and partially supported by the Exascale Computing Project
(ECP). This is a Spack bundle package that installs the CEED software
components.
